entry.title: 在ubuntu上安装较新版本的nodejs
entry.content:
bash sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install -y python-software-properties python g++ make sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:chris-lea/node.js sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install nodejs 因为用到 add-apt-repository 可能需要安装 software-properties-common
bash sudo apt-get install software-properties-common

来源：Installing Node.js via package manager

entry.title: 在Ubuntu上使用nginx官方源安装nginx
entry.content:
0.添加key bash sudo apt-key adv --keyserver keyserver.ubuntu.com --recv-keys ABF5BD827BD9BF62 1.添加到nginx官方源到 /etc/apt/sources.list bash deb http://nginx.org/packages/ubuntu/ precise nginx 2.如果原来安装过nginx，备份相关配置文件后删除nginx及其相关组件 bash sudo apt-get purge nginx* 3.安装nginx bash sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install nginx 4.安装成功后可以用-v查看ningx版本 ```bash nginx -v

nginx version: nginx/1.4.4

``` 来源：How to Setup Rails App With Puma and NGINX
